title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 04 May 2017 - XWiki
content:
<Aranjedeath> has quit  
04:50 <OSIMasson1> has quit  
05:11 <zzeroo> has quit  
05:18 <zzeroo> has joined #xwiki  
08:24 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
10:19 <floflobel> has joined #xwiki  
10:35 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:44 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
10:47 <acotiuga> Hello! As I can see on, XE 9.3.1 the default Admin profile is not hidden and the default groups are hidden. The new created users and groups are also created as not hidden. Is this the expected behavior or it's a bug that these pages are not created as hidden? Thanks!  
10:47 <floflobel> Hi, I need to convert all page to language "en", so that the search function isn't multiple language  
10:49 <VincentMassol[m]> acotiuga: I don't think we want to hide user profile pages  
10:49 <VincentMassol[m]> regarding groups, I don't know  
10:50 <tmortagne[m]> I confirm I see many users use the standard search to find users so we should not hide them  
10:51 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:51 <tmortagne[m]> I guess for groups it's ok since it's more technical (not much information for basic users)  
10:52 <VincentMassol[m]> it could still be useful for normal users to find names of groups maybe when they search in searxh suggets f.ex  
10:52 <VincentMassol[m]> (since they don't have access to the groups ui)  
10:52 <tmortagne[m]> now we could have a configuration about that since in some use case it does make sense to hide other users profiles I guess  
10:52 <tmortagne[m]> but the default should still be not hidden  
11:00 <acotiuga> Thanks for the answers.  
11:18 <sgc072> has joined #xwiki  
11:55 <tmortagne[m]> Enygma: "[WARNING] Rule violated for bundle xwiki-platform-refactoring-api: instructions covered ratio is 0.83, but expected minimum is 0.89"  
12:03 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
12:11 <sgc072> has quit  
12:11 <floflobel> I have a problem with the search box suggesting when I type a word that I want this one to work in part (gif: https://media.giphy.com/media/xUPGcikU6LeeW6FI40/giphy.gif). I tried to reindex all the pages of my wiki, but it has not changed anything, do you have an idea to solve the problem? Ty  
12:25 <OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
12:50 <OSIMasson1> has quit  
14:05 <Enygma`> tmortagne (@tmortagne:matrix.xwiki.com): addressing this and others soon. Thanks  
15:45 <evalica> has quit  
15:52 <OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
15:58 <acotiuga> has quit  
16:06 <ClmentAubin[m]> Hi everyone !  
16:06 <ClmentAubin[m]> I’ve been trying to fix https://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-14211 and I’m having a hard time figuring out how the list of available extensions is stored in the platform. Does someone have any advice / indication ?  
16:08 <tmortagne[m]> caubin: the extension index is stored in the permanent directory in <permdir>/extension/repository/  
16:08 <tmortagne[m]> each extension is associated to a .xed file in which it's indicated where it's installed (or not installed)  
16:10 <ClmentAubin[m]> Ok, thanks !  
16:55 <msmeria> has quit  
16:57 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
17:15 <Nehagup\_> has quit  
17:27 <Aranjedeath> has joined #xwiki  
17:34 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
17:57 <evalica> has quit  
18:28 <slayerjain> has joined #xwiki  
18:30 <slayerjain> Got selected for gsoc 2017. Thanks tmortagne[m] and the xwiki team!  
18:31 <slayerjain> why have some of you changed your alias by appending '[m]'?  
18:53 <ChuanDeSheng[m]> has joined #xwiki  
18:55 <OSIMasson1> has quit  
19:13 <ChuanDeSheng[m]> Hi Xwiki team! Thank you (especially vmassol) for selecting me for gsoc. Excited to be working with the community :)  
19:51 <floflobel> has quit  
20:31 <Slashman> has quit  
21:38 <Aranjedeath> has quit  
22:37 <cjd[m]> slayerjain: the [m] stuff is because we're all using Matrix chat (a.k.a. https://riot.im/app/#/room/#xwiki:matrix.org ) which is bridged to matrix. It's a little like IRCCloud but is open source  
22:37 <slayerjain> Awesome.. coming onboard! :)  
22:39 <slayerjain[m]> has joined #xwiki  
22:43 <VincentMassol[m]> Chuan De Sheng: cool, glad you're  joining the xwiki project for the summer!  
22:43 <VincentMassol[m]> slayerjain: welcome aboard too!  
22:44 <slayerjain[m]> :)  
22:44 <cjd[m]> hrm  
22:46 <slayerjain[m]> its pretty late in my time zone, I'm attempting the AWS Solutions architect professional certification tomorrow. Gotta sleep, see you guys tomorrow :)  
22:46 <cjd[m]> gn  
22:46 <cjd[m]> I invited you because you ended up in the split room somehow  
22:46 <cjd[m]> this room -> avatars and pretty things :)  
22:47 <slayerjain[m]> oh!!  
22:47 <slayerjain[m]> cool :D  
22:47 <cjd[m]> And silly annoying little sparkles which I added to my nick xD  
22:47 <cjd[m]> you can do /nick <whatever> and then paste emoji lol  
22:47 <slayerjain[m]> hahaha  
22:48 <cjd[m]> anyway good night  
22:48 <slayerjain[m]> goodnight. Cya :)
